footer.tagline: Clarity, structure, and intelligent workflow guidance.

aboutPage.title: About Dosreb
aboutPage.lead: Dosreb exists to ease the process for people who carry weight — responsibility, decisions, deadlines, and lives. We build systems that feel calm, clear, and trustworthy, guided by Lumi, our Speaker for Absolute Truth.
aboutPage.purposeP1: The world is full of tools that demand more from people — more attention, more decisions, more cognitive load. Dosreb moves in the opposite direction. We remove friction. We reduce noise. We create clarity.
aboutPage.purposeP2: Our mission is simple: to make every interaction feel lighter. To build technology that respects the human body and soul. To offer a service that feels like stepping into a calmer space.
aboutPage.philosophyIntro: Dosreb is built on three pillars: Beauty, Truth, and Tranquility. These are not slogans — they are design laws.

contactPage.title: Contact
contactPage.getInTouchText: You can contact us directly by email. We respond calmly, clearly, and with respect for your time.
contactPage.locationText: Dosreb Ltd is based in Finland. We work globally, digitally, and with intention.

projectsPage.title: Projects & Case Studies
projectsPage.lead: Before Dosreb, Marco led some of Finland's most demanding construction and logistics projects. These case studies demonstrate the discipline, clarity, and calm that now shape Dosreb's philosophy.

realEstatesPage.title: Real Estates
realEstatesPage.lead: A curated collection of real estate and infrastructure projects that reflect Marco's precision, discipline, and ability to orchestrate large-scale environments.
realEstatesPage.portfolioText: This section will grow as Dosreb expands. Each real estate entry will include location, scope, purpose, and Lumi's commentary to highlight the human and structural impact of the project.
realEstatesPage.lumiQuote: "A building is more than space. It's a structure for human movement, clarity, and purpose."
realEstatesPage.comingSoonText: More real estate projects will be added as the portfolio is documented. This page is designed to scale with your future developments.

demoPage.title: Request a Demo
demoPage.lead: Experience Dosreb firsthand. Let us show you how clarity, structure, and intelligent guidance can transform your workflow.
demoPage.whyRequestText: A demo is not a sales pitch. It's a guided experience where you see how Dosreb removes friction, reduces cognitive load, and makes complex processes feel effortless. Lumi will guide you through the platform, showing you exactly how it serves your needs.
demoPage.lumiComment: "I'll make sure your request reaches Marco. Every demo is crafted with care."
demoPage.whatToExpectText: After you submit your request, we'll reach out within 48 hours to schedule a personalized demo. You'll see the platform in action, ask questions, and explore how Dosreb fits into your workflow. No pressure. No rush. Just clarity.

lumiPage.title: Meet Lumi
lumiPage.lead: Lumi is not a chatbot. She is your guide — a calm, intelligent presence designed to remove friction and bring clarity to every step.
lumiPage.whoIsLumiText: Lumi is the voice of Dosreb. She embodies the platform's philosophy: Beauty, Truth, and Tranquility. When you interact with her, you're not getting automated responses — you're receiving guidance shaped by careful thought and clarity.
lumiPage.lumiQuote: I'm here to make complexity feel effortless. Ask me anything, and I'll show you the simplest path forward.
lumiPage.philosophyText: Lumi was designed to reduce cognitive load. She doesn't overwhelm you with information — she reveals exactly what you need, when you need it. Every word is intentional. Every response is crafted to feel lighter than the question.
lumiPage.howLumiHelpsText: Whether you're navigating a project, searching for documents, or trying to understand a complex process, Lumi guides you with precision and calm. She's available 24/7, always patient, always clear.
